title: Афоня
overview: Afonya is a brownie with experience, accustomed to life in the old Khrushchev, where everyone knows each other. But now he's being moved to a modern apartment complex where people don't even greet their neighbors. Together with his longtime friend Semenych, a former pediatrician, he decides to restore order – grandpa gets a job as a concierge, and Afonya takes the situation into her (magical) hands.But will they be able to bring comfort and harmony to a house where some make noise at night, others hide behind gadgets, and others do not believe in brownies at all? There is a lot of humor, magic and unpredictable adventures in the new comedy series!
